thread.title: Apple patent reveals bumpers that extend when an iPhone is dropped
thread.title_full: Apple patent reveals bumpers that extend when an iPhone is dropped

title: Apple patent reveals bumpers that extend when an iPhone is dropped
text:
Apple patent reveals 'bumpers' that extend when an iPhone is dropped 
Daily Mail Saturday 24th October, 2015 
The files reveal the tech firm plans to build retractable 'bumpers' into the front of a future device that will extend if the phone senses it has been dropped.?...
